name: My (Quarantine) Day
description:
How do you spend your day during lockdown?

In this research project, my purpose in creating My (Quarantine) Day is to make a game related to myself and to develop my pixel art drawing skills. I wish to put the play in a relaxing 2D world of scenes in my life, together with a variety interaction with different items in the game. On the other hand, the title of the game contains brackets because a day during lockdown and the one before/after lockdown are no differences to me. Towards this end, My (Quarantine) Day is a 2D point-and-click game with cute and attractive pixel artwork and animation focus on what a day like in my life. The game maintains a relaxing and calm tone with featured sound effects and mild background music.

Hope you enjoy it:)

How to play:

By using mouse clicks only
